dcterms:creator: M. Brown
G. Hua
S.A.G. Winder
dcterms:description: The Brown dataset consists of three subsets, namely, Yosemite, Notredame, and Liberty. Usually, one of the subsets is picked as the training set and the other two subsets are used for testing.
dcterms:title: Brown dataset

dcterms:creator: K. Mikolajczyk
C. Schmid
dcterms:description: The Oxford dataset is used to evaluate the generalization ability of the proposed network on six image sequences with varying degrees of distortions.
dcterms:title: Oxford dataset

dcterms:creator: V. Balntas
K. Lenc
A. Vedaldi
K. Mikolajczyk
dcterms:description: The HPatches dataset is composed of local patches extracted from different scenes, organized in a way that patches with identical 3D point indices are matching ones.
dcterms:title: HPatches dataset
